availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. Morgan (Barren County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, resident and Indiana soldier. Indiana native. Son of Isaac Morgan and Sarah Morgan. Married to Mary B. Morgan. Student in Centre, Indiana, in 1850. Served in the 80th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment as a second lieutenant from September 3, 1862, to August 26, 1864. Resident of Barren County in December 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, , Indiana, Porter County, Centre Township, p. 107A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Glasgow, p. 562B.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Indiana ..., Vol. 3 of 8 (Indianapolis: A.H. Connor [etc.] State Printer, 1869) 32.
